Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item is valued at $12000 by us, reflecting its high quality, unique features, and the time and effort invested into its creation. Given its significance and the benefits it offers, I believe this is an opportunity not to be missed. I kindly invite you to consider purchasing it at this special offer price of $10000. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of serving you with our top-tier product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
